remarks: A restriction of an isometry is an isometry.  The condition ` A C_ X ` is not necessary but makes the proof easier.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
ismtyres.2 $e |- B = ( F " A ) $.
ismtyres.3 $e |- S = ( M |` ( A X. A ) ) $.
ismtyres.4 $e |- T = ( N |` ( B X. B ) ) $.
ismtyres $p |- ( ( ( M e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ N e. ( *Met ` Y ) ) /\ ( F e. ( M Ismty N ) /\ A C_ X ) ) -> ( F |` A ) e. ( S Ismty T ) ) $.
